errors.message: Must use PM33 design tokens and CSS classes
errors.suggestion: Use className="pm33-*" classes and var(--pm33-*) CSS custom properties

errors.message: Missing glass morphism - ALL cards must have backdrop-blur
errors.suggestion: Add: backdrop-filter: blur(20px) and -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px) or use className="pm33-glass-card"

errors.message: Missing gradient text - ALL headlines must use gradient styling
errors.suggestion: Add: className="text-gradient" or background: linear-gradient(...)

errors.message: Insufficient shadow depth - Use professional shadows, never flat
errors.suggestion: Replace shadow-sm with shadow-glass or shadow-premium

errors.message: Theme-conditional inline styles forbidden - Use CSS classes with design tokens
errors.suggestion: Replace with className using CSS custom properties (e.g., className="pm33-glass-card")
